text: ellezine ye'kulune-rriba la yekumune illa kema yekumu-llezi yetehabbetuhu-sseytanu mine-lmess. zalike biennehum kalu inneme-lbey`u mislu-rriba. veehalle-llahu-lbey`a veharrame-rriba. femen caehu mev`izatum mir rabbihi fenteha felehu ma selef. veemruhu ile-llah. vemen `ade feulaike ashabu-nnar. hum fiha halidun
